🧊

Hoshizaki Ice Maker

Cycle overview, maintenance, troubleshooting

📖 Manual 🛠 Parts 🚨 Troubleshooting

Cycle Overview

  1. Fill → Water valve opens to target level
  2. Freeze → Compressor on, water pump circulating
  3. Harvest → Hot gas valve energizes, ice drops
  4. Refill → Bin switch checked, repeat cycle

Service Intervals

  • Clean condenser coil monthly
  • Descale evaporator quarterly
  • Sanitize water circuit quarterly
  • Replace inlet filter every 6 months

Troubleshooting

🔧 Quick Troubleshooting

Select the issue you're experiencing:

Solution:

Common Issues Reference:

No Ice Production
  • Clean condenser; verify fan operation
  • Check refrigerant charge/subcooling
  • Verify bin switch not stuck
No Harvest
  • Test hot gas valve coil
  • Verify cube thickness control
  • Check water temperature
